name: Gopher Port
description:
Gopher

You are a farmer, plagued by a pesky gopher trying to steal your carrots! Fill in the gopher's holes, but try not to stray too far from your veggies or the gopher will get faster than you can stop him. Occasionally the pelican will fly overhead to refill your crops, but you have to be able to catch the seed on its way down!

Controls

Arrow Keys: Left/Right Movement
X Button: Shovel (fill in holes, whack the gopher, or plant a new seed)

Game

This is a port of the 1982 Atari 2600 game Gopher. This version is adapted to Pico-8 and Lua. This modification was made during a one week period in Pico-8.
